The next hour the storm dropped 0.5 inch of rain for 1 hour so 1*0.5 = <<1*0.5=0.5>>0.5 inches
All total the storm dropped 5 inches + 2.5 inches + 0.5 inch for = <<5+2.5+0.5=6>>6 inches
It rained for 2 hours total so 6/2 = <<6/2=3>>3 inches of rain per hour
